description: This file defines a VisualizationTools class that provides methods for creating various types of charts (bar, line, pie, scatter, histogram) using matplotlib. It includes data normalization, chart creation, and saving functionalities, and registers chart methods based on configuration flags.

classes.name: VisualizationTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for generating various types of charts with configurable options, handling data normalization, and saving charts to a specified directory.

methods.name: _normalize_data_for_charts
methods.description: Normalizes various data formats into a dictionary with string keys and numeric values suitable for charting.

methods.name: create_bar_chart
methods.description: Creates and saves a bar chart from provided data, returning chart info as JSON.

methods.name: create_line_chart
methods.description: Creates and saves a line chart from provided data, returning chart info as JSON.

methods.name: create_pie_chart
methods.description: Creates and saves a pie chart from provided data, returning chart info as JSON.

methods.name: create_scatter_plot
methods.description: Creates and saves a scatter plot from provided data, returning chart info as JSON.

methods.name: create_histogram
methods.description: Creates and saves a histogram from numeric data, returning chart info as JSON.
